summary: This bill, the Save America’s Forgotten Equines Act of 2025, aims to amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to prohibit the slaughter of equines (horses, ponies, and other members of the horse family) for human consumption. It seeks to modify the existing law, which currently prohibits the slaughter of dogs and cats for this purpose, by including equines in this protection. The bill's short title is the SAFE Act of 2025.
